executiveSummary: Jared Steele from Austin, Texas, pitched his company Terishroom on Shark Tank, seeking $175,000 for 2.5% equity. Terishroom is an automated mushroom growth device with a subscription model for mushroom blocks. Despite impressive pre-sales and design, no units had yet been shipped, leading most Sharks to opt out. Kevin Oâ€™Leary offered $175,000 for 15%, which Jared declined.
keyDecisions: No deal was made; all Sharks ultimately passed on investing.
nextSteps: Jared will proceed with production and prepare to ship the first 1,140 Terishroom units to the Austin warehouse by July.
